|motto ="The light of my spark will dispel the darkness of evil."
|alternatemodes =Penguin |series =[[Beast Wars Neo]] |japanvoice =Junko Takeuchi
}} 'Break' is the name of a fictional character within the Transformers series.
He is a heroic Maximal who turns into a penguin. Break first appeared as part of
the Beast Wars Neo anime series voiced by Junko Takeuchi.
